page.title: 13Living In Cherry Hinton
page.content: I live in Cherry Hinton.Cherry Hinton got its name from the Cherry trees which we have by the bus stop,and Hinton from a family who lived there years ago.Cherry Hinton is quite a large village.It has an Infant and a Junior school and also a Primary school.There are about 6 or 7 bus stops.You can catch the bus into town but you can get most things in Cherry Hinton village.We have a good selection of shops,including a clothes shop and a shoe shop. I don't like the railway being right in the middle of the village,because it's so noisy and the people who do the gates close them too soon and we have to wait about five minutes.On Sundays it's always quiet and not as busy.There are several parks to visit and the largest is Cherry Hinton Hall.
